title: CSE 5022 - Software I: Software Components
description: Intellectual foundations of software engineering; design-by-contract principles; mathematical modeling of software functionality; component-based software from client perspective; layered data representation. Previous programming experience in any language required. Prereq: At least one term of Calculus. Not open to students with credit for 2221, 2231, 4221, 321, or 502. Not open to students enrolled in a CSE or CIS major.
professors: Paolo Bucci,Adam Grupa,Matthew Boggus,Bettina Bair,Robert Latour,Alan Weide,Swaroop Joshi,Benjamin Trevor
